hero.title: DYKESWHOTECH
description: Partnering with DykesWhoTech is more than a strategic investment—it’s a direct commitment to a thriving ecosystem of over 400 LGBTQ+ women professionals in tech. With dozens of successful projects already under our belt, we are the only community providing a dedicated, high-impact space where top-tier talent meets radical inclusion.

When you support us, you aren't just sponsoring an organization; you are directly fueling a grassroots movement that builds real-world tools, fosters leadership, and creates a more representative future for the industry.

items.title: Brand Visibility & Awareness
items.text: Feature your logo across our digital platforms, monthly newsletters, and marketing materials for flagship events like the Dykeathon and Drink & Dyke.

items.title: Direct Access to Top Talent
items.text: Reach a highly skilled, niche audience of developers, product managers, designers, and entrepreneurs.

items.title: Demonstrate Your Commitment to DEI
items.text: Move beyond slogans. A partnership with us provides a tangible way to act on your Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion goals.

items.title: Exclusive Event Engagement
items.text: Get a seat at the table. Host professional workshops, join panel discussions, or have a branded presence at our high-energy meetups.

collaboration.title: Ways to Collaborate
collaboration.subtitle: All engagement options include job postings on our official website and community platforms.

items.title: Professional Workshop | $2,500
items.text: Host a technical or product-focused session led by our experts, designed for either your internal teams or our broader community.

items.title: LGBTQ+ Diversity Talk | $2,500
items.text: An engaging and educational session for your organization on LGBTQ+ inclusion and the unique power of diverse tech teams.

items.title: Full Event Experience | $7,500
items.text: A high-energy corporate event featuring a professional DJ from our community, bringing the unmistakable DykesWhoTech vibe to your company.

customImpact.title: Custom Impact: Let’s Build the Future Together
text: Don’t see exactly what you’re looking for? The options above are just the starting point.

We believe the most effective partnerships are built on shared goals. Whether you want to focus on high-volume recruitment, long-term brand positioning, or a unique community initiative, we are ready to tailor a package that fits your specific budget and vision.
